comment._content: Margaret Pattison Thom (1873-1930), aka Makareti Papakura www.dnzb.govt.nz/dnzb/alt_essayBody.asp?essayID=3P5

comment.author: 81594342@N00
comment._content:
What a stunningly beautiful portrait. Not only the obvious beauty of the model herself, but also the very photography itself: Tones, expression, DOF... 
Ms Makereti must have been an impressing woman herself her eyes speak of an extremely intelligent person.

comment.author: 68672496@N05
comment._content: The cloak she wears is made of Kiwi Feathers. She was a highly thought of woman and was the author of 'The Old Maori" www.monumentalstories.gen.nz/bio_36.html
